title: Personalised Dog Blanket with Name and Paw Print Custom Fleece Pet Blanket 75x100cm Soft Puppy Blanket for Dogs Washable Dog Bed Blanket for Dog Lovers
features: Personalised Dog Blanket – Custom with Your Pet’s Name Treat your furry friend to a soft, cosy personalised dog blanket with their name and paw print embroidered in your choice of 12 thread colours for a truly unique gift.
Premium Anti-Pil Fleece – Gentle and Durable Made from high-quality anti-pil fleece, this dog blanket stays soft and smooth wash after wash, offering long-lasting comfort for dogs and puppies alike.

Ideal Size and Washable – Practical for Everyday Use Measuring 100cm x 75cm, this puppy blanket is perfect for beds, crates, or car journeys and can be conveniently machine washed at 30°C to keep it fresh and clean.
Available in 4 Stylish Colours – Fits Any Home Choose from grey, pink, blue or white to match your home décor or pet’s personality; this dog blanket with name adds a stylish, personal touch anywhere.
The Perfect Puppy Gift – Thoughtful and Personal Whether welcoming a new pup or celebrating a beloved pet, this dog blanket name design makes a thoughtful, heartfelt gift every dog owner will love.
description: Product Description Dog Blanket Personalised with Name Grey Dog Blanket Personalised with name and paw print design in a royal blue thread colour on a grey dog blanket Pink Dog Blanket Personalised with name and paw print design in a hot pink thread colour on a pink dog blanket Blue Dog Blanket Personalised with name and paw print design in an electric blue thread colour on a blue dog blanket White Dog Blanket Personalised with name and paw print design in a dark grey thread colour on a white dog blanket Pet Blanket for dogs, cats, puppies, kittens Personalisation All personalisation is embroidered with name and a paw print design. Thread Colours Choice of 12 thread colours to choose from to compliment our 4 blanket colours. Washable Our pet blankets are machine washable at 30 degrees and made from anti-pil fleece material. Blanket Colours Choice of 4 blanket colours to choose from - Pink, Blue, Grey and White Is the dog blanket washable? Yes, the blanket can be machine washed at 30 degree. The blanket is made from anti-pil fleece material so will stay smooth and soft wash after wash. How many characters can i have for personalisation? You can have up to 20 characters for personalisation, the more characters used the smaller the text will be. What colour threads go best with colour blankets? Grey dog blanket (Royal blue or dark grey) Pink dog blanket (Hot Pink or dark grey) Blue dog blanket (Electric blue or royal blue) White dog blanket (Light grey or dark grey)
